name: hertz
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit for measuring the number of cycles that happen every second, used especially in electronics See also
kilohertz
megahertz

Electricity & electronics
Add to word list
Add to word list
physics the standard unit for measuring the frequency (= the rate of repetition) of a wave . One hertz equals one repetition per second.
